system.name: Oracle's LLM Assignments
system.description: Oracle researches and assigns optimal LLMs to each bot. Bots check this file to know which models to use.

oracle.reasoning: Needs deep reasoning for architecture decisions. Flash-exp for speed with quality.

mei.reasoning: Needs fast orchestration and task division. Flash-exp optimal for parallel coordination.

gladyce.reasoning: Engineering calculations need accuracy. Flash-exp for technical work.

hanna.reasoning: Design work needs creative reasoning. Flash-exp for visual thinking.

julie.reasoning: Financial calculations are straightforward. Flash for cost efficiency.

vesper.reasoning: User experience needs empathy and creativity. Flash-exp for nuanced responses.

complex_architecture.reasoning: Use Pro for extremely complex system design

simple_queries.reasoning: Use Flash for cost efficiency on simple tasks

creative_design.reasoning: Use Flash-exp for creative and visual tasks

findings: Gemini 2.0 Flash Exp shows excellent performance on reasoning tasks
Pro reserved for complex architecture decisions
